mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bedu_rw_bd (RW_NUM TITLE, USER_NAME, CONTENT, RW_GRADE, LECT_NUM, RW_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID) VALUES (#{rwNum}, #{title}, #{userName}, #{rwGrade}, #{lectNum}, #{rwDate}, #{regDate}, #{regId})
mapper.select: SELECT RW.TITLE as title , RW.CONTENT as content , RW.USER_NAME as userName , RW.RW_GRADE as rwGrade , RW.RW_DATE as rwDate , FILD.LECT_TOP_CATE , FILD.LECT_TOP_CATE_KOR , FILD.LECT_MID_CATE , FILD.LECT_MID_CATE_KOR , FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE , FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE_KOR FROM t_bedu_rw_bd RW LEFT JOIN t_bedu_lect LECT ON RW.LECT_NUM = LECT.LECT_NUM LEFT JOIN t_bedu_lect_fild FILD ON LECT.CATE_CODE = FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE

SELECT RW.TITLE as title , RW.CONTENT as content , RW.USER_NAME as userName , RW.RW_GRADE as rwGrade , RW.RW_DATE as rwDate , FILD.LECT_TOP_CATE as lectTopCate , FILD.LECT_TOP_CATE_KOR as lectTopCateKor , FILD.LECT_MID_CATE , FILD.LECT_MID_CATE_KOR , FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE , FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE_KOR FROM t_bedu_rw_bd RW LEFT JOIN t_bedu_lect LECT ON RW.LECT_NUM = LECT.LECT_NUM LEFT JOIN t_bedu_lect_fild FILD ON LECT.CATE_CODE = FILD.LECT_BOT_CATE WHERE RW.CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND FILD.LECT_TOP_CATE = #{topCate}
